Class IdlePhase

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.GamePhase
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.IdlePhase
public class IdlePhase extends GamePhase
Represents the initial phase of the game, where players can join the lobby and choose their colors. Once the lobby is full and all players have chosen a color, the game transitions to the appropriate building phase.

  • Method Details

    • connectPlayerToGame

      public void connectPlayerToGame(String playerUsername) throws FullLobbyException, UsernameAlreadyTakenException
      Adds a player to the game if the lobby is not full and the username is not already taken. If the maximum number of players is reached, marks the lobby as full.
      Overrides:
      connectPlayerToGame in class GamePhase
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - The username of the player to add.
      Throws:
      FullLobbyException - If the lobby is already full.
      UsernameAlreadyTakenException - If the username is already used by another player.

    • chooseColor

      public void chooseColor(String username, String chosenColor)
      Sets the color for the player with the given username and checks if all players are ready. If the lobby is full and all players have selected a color, transitions to the appropriate building phase and notifies each player with a SetBuildingPhaseAction.
      Overrides:
      chooseColor in class GamePhase
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player who chose the color.
      chosenColor - The color selected by the player.

      Returns the name of this phase.

      Returns:
      The string "IdlePhase".
